title: Topic 001 Question 110
body: Your Security team believes that a former employee of your company gained unauthorized access to Google Cloud resources some time in the past 2 months by using a service account key. You need to confirm the unauthorized access and determine the user activity. What should you do?
options: Use Security Health Analytics to determine user activity.
Use the Cloud Monitoring console to filter audit logs by user.
Use the Cloud Data Loss Prevention API to query logs in Cloud Storage.
Use the Logs Explorer to search for user activity.
